title: #173: Skeptiko Swapcast | Alex Tsakiris
description:
This episode was a swap cast with Alex Tsakiris of Skeptiko. He sold his artificial intelligence company a few years ago and has been able to focus his energies on trying to figure out why human beings behave the way they do, and to understand human consciousness.

Alex examines concepts like “evil” on his show, and that topic comes up in this episode as well as we sort out what is happening with the current medical martial law scenarios that are taking place throughout the world.
